entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 1100 metres rising to 1600 metres this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero with risk of frost. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
